remarks: Expanded membership relation for the set of atoms, i.e. the predicate "is an atom (of the Hilbert lattice)."  An atom is a nonzero element of a lattice such that anything less than it is zero, i.e. it is the smallest nonzero element of the lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elat2 $p |- ( A e. HAtoms <-> ( A e. CH /\ ( A =/= 0H /\ A. x e. CH ( x C_ A -> ( x = A \/ x = 0H ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
